title: Waaree Renewable bags 30 MW solar project in Maharashtra
description: WRTL secured a 22 MW AC/30 MWp DC turnkey solar project from Kirloskar groupâ€™s ISMT Limited in Helas village, Jalna district. WRTL will provide engineering, procurement, construction, commissioning, and maintenance to ensure optimal performance. The project includes bifacial modules, transmission lines, evacuation infrastructure, substation setup, and obtaining statutory approvals.
